text: Forget about the Oscars, these pups are more excited about the Pawscars! This Sunday before the 2018 Oscars, we ’ re enlisting nine puppies to help us predict the Best Picture winner! During E! ’ s Countdown to the Red Carpet : The 2018 Academy Awards special starting at 1 p. m. ET / 10 a. m. PT, the puppies will travel down a red carpet course through paparazzi and other obstacles to get to the Pawscar. If that ’ s not cute enough for you, each of the nine puppies will wear an adorable little t - shirt with the logo of each nominated movie on it, and the first puppy to reach the Pawscar wins!
